schema.description: 地域ID。您可以调用[DescribeRegions](~~25609~~)查看最新的阿里云地域列表。

是否预检本次请求。取值范围：

- true：发送检查请求，不会直接回滚云盘。检查项包括是否填写了必选参数、请求格式和资源状态限制。如果检查不通过，则返回对应错误信息。如果检查通过，则返回错误码`DryRunOperation`。
- false：发送正常请求，通过检查后直接发起云盘回滚操作。

默认值：false。

SnapshotId.description: 实例快照中，指定云盘对应的快照ID。N的取值范围为1~10。

DiskId.description: 指定待回滚的云盘ID。N的取值范围为1~10。

OperationProgress.description: 回滚一个或多个云盘时的操作状态信息合集。

ErrorMsg.description:
错误信息。回滚成功时返回空值。

<props="intl">错误码和错误信息，请参见[错误中心](https://error-center.alibabacloud.com/status/product/Ecs)。</props>

<props="china">错误码和错误信息，请参见[错误中心](https://error-center.aliyun.com/status/product/Ecs)。</props>

ErrorCode.description:
错误码。回滚成功时返回空值。


<props="intl">错误码和错误信息，请参见[错误中心](https://error-center.alibabacloud.com/status/product/Ecs)。</props>

<props="china">错误码和错误信息，请参见[错误中心](https://error-center.aliyun.com/status/product/Ecs)。</props>

OperationStatus.description:
操作是否成功。
成功返回Success，失败返回ErrorCode和ErrorMsg信息。

400.errorMessage: The operation is not supported to the specified disk due to its disk category.
The specified RegionId is not valid.
Request validation has been passed with DryRun flag set.

403.errorMessage: The current disk status does not support this operation.
The current status of the resource does not support this operation.
The instance is locked due to security.
The specified snapshot is not created from the specified disk.
The snapshotId is created before 2013-07-15, it cannot be restored since the first time the disk detached.
The specified operation is denied as your prepay instance is expired (prepay mode) or in arrears (afterpay mode).
The specified snapshot dees not support ResetDisk.
The specified snapshot has not completed yet.
Your account does not have enough balance.
Snapshot service has not been opened yet.
The operation may conflicts with others.
The user is not in disk white list.
The CMK needs to be added ECS tag.
The CMK needs to be enabled.
ECS service have no right to access your KMS.
The current disk has unfinished snapshot.
The specified region does not support resetting disks.
Multi attach disk does not support this operation.

404.errorMessage: The specified disk does not exist.
The specified disk does not exist.
The specified SnapshotId does not exist.
The specified InstanceId does not exist.
The RegionId provided does not exist in our records.
The SnapshotId provided does not exist in our records.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

title: 批量重置磁盘
summary: 调用ResetDisks通过实例快照回滚一个或多个云盘。
description: 该接口即将废弃，建议您使用[ResetDisk](~~25520~~)回滚云盘。
